author: John Epstein, Penobscot Bay Press
title: This Maine man is helping the NBA get into upcycling
text:
Posted in Business You could soon own flooring from an NBA All-Star game thanks to this Maine man by John Epstein, Penobscot Bay Press 2 hours ago October 3, 2024 Share this: Click to share on Twitter (Opens in new window) Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Click to share on Reddit (Opens in new window) Click to print (Opens in new window) Click to email a link to a friend (Opens in new window) Brooksville wood craftsman Ron Corl holds a piece of flooring used in the NBA‚Äôs 2024 All-Star game. Behind him is a section of flooring showing a portion of the three-point line. Credit: Courtesy of John Epstein / Penobscot Bay press BROOKSVILLE, Maine ‚Äî In the spirit of not letting anything go to waste, people in Brooksville have long found new uses for things that have outlived their original purpose‚Äîa leaky dinghy becomes a giant flower pot, old tires now buttress a mailbox, or worn-out lobster traps get stacked to form a town‚Äôs Christmas tree.
Now, on the Cape Rosier side of town, Ron Corl, a furniture craftsman, is helping the National Basketball Association get into the repurposing act by designing wood products from NBA court floors.
‚ÄúThey found me,‚Äù Corl said, describing an NBA subsidiary business known as NBA Labs. ‚ÄúThey help small businesses that don‚Äôt have the big money to partner with the NBA.‚Äù
At the time, 2019, Corl was running his own business constructing and selling golf-themed furniture in Ohio. NBA Labs spotted him on the internet and wanted his help reusing portable basketball court flooring used in a 2011 All-Star game played in Los Angeles.
‚ÄúOnce that flooring is installed three or four times, it‚Äôs not thick enough for games,‚Äù Corl noted.
Corl‚Äôs current assignment requires cutting up the court flooring used by the NBA in the 2024 All-Star game, played in Indianapolis, into approximately 50,000 2-inch-square sections.
‚ÄúThey are going to be individually boxed and sold in Walmart, hopefully by February 2025,‚Äù he said.
One of Corl‚Äôs biggest challenges is finding help with the woodworking.
‚ÄúWhen I was in the middle of Ohio, I was near the biggest Amish community in the United States, and I had plenty of workers,‚Äù Corl said, although he has been able to get help from a neighboring couple down the road, for which he is very grateful. ‚ÄúBut I‚Äôve pretty much been working seven days a week since July to get this work done.‚Äù
The 65-year-old woodworker described one of his early NBA wood court projects: cutting thousands of pieces of purple and gold laminated sections of the flooring for an artist who used computer pixilation technology to make a 12-by-12-foot wooden mosaic portrait of Laker great Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal.
‚ÄúWe hung it up in Las Vegas on a huge easel I built. It was amazing,‚Äù said Corl, who also used his precision equipment to shave thick sheets of NBA flooring into ultra thin wood veneers for cigar humidors and mobile phone cases.
New to the area, Corl and his wife, Susan, a weaver, accepted internships in 2023 as resident stewards at the Good Life Center near Harborside, the abode of the late back-to-the-land advocates Scott and Helen Nearing.
After a spring, summer and early fall tending gardens and looking out onto Orr Cove, the Corls decided to relocate from Ohio. The couple now rents a house just down the road from the old Grange Hall on Cape Rosier Road. The town of Brooksville agreed to rent him shop space for three months in a nearby town garage that also houses a mid-20th century fire truck, sharing space as the NBA project marches toward completion.
This story appears through a media partnership with the Penobscot Bay Press.

author: TT
title: Castorama et Leroy Merlin r√©duisent leurs effectifs dans leurs si√®ges
text:
L'enseigne de bricolage pr√©voit une rupture conventionnelle qui pourra concerner jusqu'√† 100 salari√©s de son si√®ge pr√®s de Lille alors que son concurrent a aussi r√©cemment r√©duit ses effectifs dans ses fonctions centrales. L'enseigne de bricolage Castorama pr√©voit une rupture conventionnelle qui pourra concerner jusqu'√† 100 salari√©s de son si√®ge, pr√®s de Lille, soit un sur sept, alors que son concurrent Leroy Merlin a aussi r√©cemment r√©duit ses effectifs dans ses fonctions centrales.
"La rupture conventionnelle collective s'applique uniquement aux salari√©s volontaires du si√®ge de l'enseigne. Aucun collaborateur des magasins n'est concern√©", a pr√©cis√© Castorama dans un communiqu√© re√ßu vendredi. Ce dispositif s'inscrit dans le cadre d'un plan strat√©gique de Castorama lanc√© en mars, qui a pour objectif de redresser sa rentabilit√© et l'aider √† rester comp√©titif "dans un contexte concurrentiel en constante √©volution", a ajout√© l'entreprise.
Enseigne du groupe britannique Kingfisher, Castorama compte au total plus de 11.000 collaborateurs et 95 magasins en France. Apr√®s avoir connu un boom du bricolage durant la pand√©mie de Covid-19 , le secteur d√©chante en France. Au troisi√®me trimestre, les ventes de Castorama ont recul√© de 4,9% sur un an, selon les derniers r√©sultats de Kingfisher publi√©s lundi. Le groupe britannique, √©galement propri√©taire de Brico D√©p√¥t (dont les ventes ont d√©clin√© de 3,3% sur la m√™me p√©riode), a mis ces mauvais chiffres sur le compte de "la faiblesse du moral des consommateurs et de conditions m√©t√©orologiques d√©favorables".
D√©part de 130 collaborateurs chez Leroy Merlin Grand rival de Castorama, Leroy Merlin a aussi proc√©d√© √† une rupture conventionnelle collective ces derniers mois dans son si√®ge de Lezennes, dans la banlieue lilloise, entra√Ænant le d√©part de 130 collaborateurs, a indiqu√© l'enseigne vendredi, confirmant des informations des Echos . Le chiffre d'affaires de Leroy Merlin "enregistre un recul √† l'image du march√©", a ajout√© une porte-parole, sans d√©tailler davantage.
"En cause essentiellement, la baisse des transactions immobili√®res et des naissances", qui amoindrit les travaux effectu√©s par les Fran√ßais, a-t-elle expliqu√©. Comptant environ 30.000 collaborateurs et 144 magasins en France selon son site, Leroy Merlin appartient √† la galaxie Mulliez, √©galement propri√©taire du distributeur Auchan, lequel a annonc√© d√©but novembre un plan social massif mena√ßant 2.389 emplois en France .

author: @CNET
title: Here Are the Switch 2 Games I'm Excited to Play - CNET
text:
Wednesday was the official reveal of the Switch 2. Nintendo revealed that its next console will come out on June 5 and have a starting price of $450. In its hour-long Nintendo Direct, a lot of games were shown and I can safely say I'm excited.
The Switch 2 looks like it's going to have a lot of support from third-party developers to go along with Nintendo's spectacular first-party games. This means the new Switch will hit the ground running as its launch lineup already looks good, but there's going to be even more must-buy games after its launch.
These are a few of the games I'm most excited about:
The Duskbloods
Arguably, the biggest surprise of Wednesday's show was The Duskbloods from popular developer FromSoftware. The studio behind Dark Souls and Elden Ring is making an exclusive game for the Switch 2, and it looks remarkably like its last exclusive game, Bloodborne. There are still many questions about the game, but this is easily going to be the most anticipated game for 2026.
Hollow Knight: Silksong
Hollow Knight from developer Team Cherry was a cult hit when it came out in 2017. Back in 2019, the developer revealed it was doing a sequel called Hollow Knight: Silksong that would focus on Hornet, a rival turned ally of the Knight who was the hero of the first game. Only a few seconds were shown during the stream, but this clip excited fans as it was confirmation that the game exists after years of silence from the developer.
Mario Kart World
If there's one franchise that is a must-buy, it would be Mario Kart. With the new game, Mario Kart World, the kart racing game goes to an open-world game, letting players travel anywhere. The game looks like so much fun, and I'm looking to buy the Switch 2 Mario Kart World Bundle when the console launches.
Donkey Kong Bananza
One of the franchises I wrote that Nintendo forgot about was Donkey Kong, so I was happy to see it come back on the Switch 2. Donkey Kong Bananza is a new 3D platforming game featuring the Nintendo mascot, and it looks like something brand-new and not just another entry in the Donkey Kong Country franchise. Nintendo did give a release date of July 17 for Donkey Kong's new game, and I can't wait.
Elden Ring Tarnished Edition
FromSoftware had a double whammy of games during the Switch 2 Direct. Even though this is a port of Elden Ring, the Tarnished Edition includes the original game as well as the DLC, Shadows of the Erdtree.
Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition
Cyberpunk 2077 is an amazing game and having that playable on a handheld console will be a sight to see. It took multiple patches to get the games to run smoothly on the Steam Deck, but if it can run well right out of the box on the Switch 2, it will be a game to pick up.
Project 007
This was another surprise from the Nintendo Direct stream. IO Interactive is developing the new Bond game, but not much other than the working title has been revealed. Still, with a studio like IO Interactive working on the game, it's easy to be excited for another Bond game.
Here are some of the other games shown on Wednesday that I'm excited for:
- Sid Meier's Civilization VII (Nintendo Switch 2 Edition)
- Split Fiction
- Street Fighter 6
- The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild (Nintendo Switch 2 Edition)
- The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom (Nintendo Switch 2 Edition)
- Yakuza 0 Director's Cut
- Shadow Labyrinth (Nintendo Switch 2 Edition)
- Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening Complete Edition
- Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 + 4
- Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment
- Marvel Cosmic Invasion
- Pok√©mon Legends: Z-A (Nintendo Switch 2 Edition)
- Borderlands 4
- Kirby Air Riders
- Metroid Prime 4: Beyond (Nintendo Switch 2 Edition)
The Switch 2 launches on June 5, and preorders will be available at retailers starting on April 9. To prevent scalpers from buying most of the Switch 2 stock, Nintendo implemented some interesting requirements for those who want to buy a Switch 2 from the company.

author: globo.com
title: Buri confirma a primeira morte por dengue em 2025; j√° s√£o quatro mortes na regi√£o no ano | Itapetininga e Regi√£o | G1
text:
1 de 1 Mosquito da dengue, em imagem de arquivo ‚Äî Foto: Divulga√ß√£o/Fiocruz Mosquito da dengue, em imagem de arquivo ‚Äî Foto: Divulga√ß√£o/Fiocruz
A Prefeitura de Buri (SP) confirmou a primeira morte por dengue em 2025 na cidade. A v i tima tinha 68 anos e era diagnosticada com press√£o alta e diabetes . Ela foi atendida no hospital da cidade na ter√ßa-feira (18).
üì≤ Participe do canal do g1 Itapetininga e Regi√£o no WhatsApp
Segundo a Secretaria de Sa√∫de, a moradora fez o teste r√°pido e deu positivo para a doen√ßa e aguardava o resultado do exame sorol√≥gico, mas faleceu um dia depois do diagn√≥stico, na noite de quarta-feira (19) .
Buri registra 21 casos confirmados da doen√ßa at√© esta quinta-feira (20). No mesmo per√≠odo do ano passado, eram 39 casos e nenhuma morte. Conforme a prefeitura, os bairros com mais casos este ano s√£o Al√©m Linha, Vila Sene e Centro.
Mortes por Dengue na regi√£o
Na regi√£o de Itapetininga, Conchas √© a cidade mais alarmante para casos de Dengue. A Prefeitura do munic√≠pio decretou situa√ß√£o de emerg√™ncia, com mais de mil casos confirmados e sete √≥bitos em investiga√ß√£o. Um homem de 60 anos morreu no dia 27 de janeiro , a morte por dengue foi confirmada nesta quarta-feira.
J√° na regi√£o de Sorocaba (SP) , a primeira morte na cidade foi no dia 09 de janeiro. A v√≠tima era uma mulher de 58 anos. J√° em Salto (SP) , a prefeitura confirmou, na segunda-feira (17) a morte de uma moradora de 44 anos que estava hospitalizada na cidade vizinha, em Indaiatuba (SP).
Dos quatro √≥bitos registrados at√© agora na regi√£o, tr√™s tinham comorbidades . J√° no caso da moradora de Salto, informa√ß√£o sobre comorbidades n√£o foi divulgada.
Conchas emite alerta de emerg√™ncia ap√≥s registrar mais de 1 mil casos de dengue

author: Redacci√≥n V√≠a Rosario
title: El tiempo en Rosario: la primera semana de 2024 entra en modo verano a pleno
text:
Despu√©s del festejo de A√±o Nuevo, el clima de verano en Rosario sale a decir presente y la temperatura empieza a subir gradualmente durante la semana inicial de 2024. El pron√≥stico incluye un combo de calor y algunas nubes para este martes . Eso s√≠, no hay lluvias a la vista al menos hasta el domingo.
El tiempo en Rosario: la lluvia copa el s√°bado y desarma las valijas para el fin de semana La primera jornada h√°bil del a√±o empez√≥ bajo un cielo pr√°cticamente despejado, mientras que la marca del term√≥metro super√≥ los 19 grados y el viento soplaba desde el sur. A primera hora, la Municipalidad report√≥ circulaci√≥n normal en los accesos a la ciudad, aunque cabe recordar que esta semana se esperan cortes de tr√°nsito en el microcentro por la reparaci√≥n de calle Santa Fe.
¬øC√≥mo estar√° el tiempo en Rosario el martes 2 de enero? El informe del Servicio Meteorol√≥gico Nacional (SMN) deja bastante margen para cualquier actividad al aire libre durante la ma√±ana. El escenario es diferente a partir del mediod√≠a de este martes, ya que se espera un aumento de temperatura significativo en Rosario .
El pron√≥stico para la jornada incluye una m√°xima de 31 ¬∞ a nivel local . As√≠ se abre la puerta a una tarde calurosa y con el cielo parcialmente nublado. Por otra parte, el viento del este promete cierto alivio durante la noche.
De acuerdo a los datos del SMN, el resto de la semana transcurrir√° sin lluvias en Rosario . Desde el mi√©rcoles se vienen ma√±anas un poco menos frescas, ya que las m√≠nimas tienden a subir ligeramente. Finalmente, reci√©n el domingo es posible que se produzcan tormentas aisladas por la madrugada.

author: Nick Robinson
title: Businesses and clubs relieved to see snow
text: WISCONSIN -- (WAOW) During most winters, snowmobiles cruising through the countryside are a common site. But with now major snowfall until recently, the trails have been bare. Now that some has fallen, area snowmobile clubs say it's a step in the right direction. Allan Zahrt, the vice president of the [Trailmates Snowmobile Club](https://www.trailmatesclub.com/), said, "We needed cold weather first, to freeze up the streams and rivers and lakes and get the ground frozen properly. So, now we're starting to get the snow on top. We do need a little bit more snow here in Marathon County." In the Northwoods, the folks at [American Pond Hockey](https://www.americanpondhockey.com/) are preparing for their annual tournament in a couple of weeks. They said that they're pleased with what Mother Nature has given so far. Will Jeffery, the founder of American Pond Hockey, said, "What we are focused on, and paying the most attention to, is the timing of the wild lake ice, and when that forms, and when the first heavyweight snow comes after that." Jeffery said that this week's single-digit temperatures will make sure that there's plenty of ice to play on come February. Further to the south, where there was more snowfall, some snowmobile clubs are already taking advantage. Several trails across Wood County are opening back up.

author: El Mercurio S.A.P.
title: Un pol√©mico penal cobrado en el final a Argentina desata un esc√°ndalo en el torneo L'Alc√∫dia: Im√°genes
text:
Nuevo esc√°ndalo en el f√∫tbol. Ahora en el torneo juvenil de selecciones, L'Alc√∫dia, donde jugaban Argentina y Mauritania.
El partido ya estaba en su recta final cuando el √°rbitro cobr√≥ un pol√©mico penal a favor de la "Albiceleste". A los jugadores africanos no les gust√≥ la sanci√≥n y le reclamaron con todo al juez.
Pese a las quejas, la pena m√°xima se ejecut√≥ y el cuadro transandino logr√≥ el empate ya cuando el encuentro se iba y se jugaban los minutos agregados.
Mientras los argentinos festejaban, los futbolistas de Mauritania se fueron contra el √°rbitro totalmente furiosos por la decisi√≥n que los priv√≥ de la victoria y dej√≥ el lance 1-1.
Fue a tal punto la rabia, que tuvo que intervenir la Guardia Civil para que el cuerpo arbitral se fuese de la cancha escoltado hasta la zona de vestuarios.
Recordar que este mi√©rcoles Argentina fue parte de un papel√≥n en los Juegos Ol√≠mpicos. Su partido fue suspendido por m√°s de una hora, cuando volvi√≥ le anularon el gol en el VAR y termin√≥ perdiendo ante Marruecos.

author: Alberto Berlini
title: Arriva l'ottobrata: caldo e bel tempo, picchi fino a sfiorare i 30 gradi
text:
Arriva l'ottobrata: caldo e bel tempo, picchi fino a sfiorare i 30 gradi
Ritorna l'anticiclone africano: a parte qualche disturbo al Nord Ovest, i prossimi sette giorni saranno caratterizzati da un clima molto mite
La dinamicit√† atmosferica che ha caratterizzato la prima parte dell'autunno sta per subire una battuta d'arresto e questo fine settimana apre un periodo decisamente diverso. Da luned√¨ assisteremo all'arrivo della classica 'ottobrata'.
Il ritorno dell'anticiclone africano
Sulla tutta Italia assisteremo a un aumento della pressione atmosferica e un rialzo termico che si far√† sentire soprattutto sulla Sardegna e sulle regioni tirreniche. Le temperature saranno di circa 4-6 gradi Celsius superiori alla media del periodo, con valori pi√π consoni al mese di settembre che a quello di ottobre. La regione pi√π calda della penisola sar√† la Sardegna, dove si potranno avere picchi fino a 27-28 ¬∞C, e dove le temperature minime saranno comprese tra i 17 e i 20 ¬∞C.
Nell'Italia centrale, le massime saranno comprese tra i 21 e i 24 ¬∞C, con picchi fino a 25-26 ¬∞C sulle zone pianeggianti del Lazio. I valori minimi oscilleranno tra i 14 e i 17 ¬∞C. Al Sud Italia e in Sicilia, i valori massimi saranno compresi tra i 23 e i 26 ¬∞C, mentre le minime saranno comprese tra i 15 e i 18 ¬∞C.
L'aumento delle temperature sar√† pi√π marginale e ben pi√π contenuto al Nord Italia dove le temperature massime saranno comprese tra i 17 e i 21 ¬∞C, a seconda delle zone, mentre i valori minimi oscilleranno tra i 12 e i 15 ¬∞C.
Nei prossimi giorni non ci saranno fenomeni atmosferici significativi, i cieli saranno sereni o poco nuvolosi. Tuttavia, tra mercoled√¨ e venerd√¨ della prossima settimana, le propaggini di una saccatura atlantica potrebbero portare instabilit√† atmosferica al Nord-Ovest.
